content:
During the combat work in the Zaporizhzhya direction, the border guards together with the soldiers of the 23rd Separate Brigade of NSU "Khortytsia" found and destroyed another complex of distant visual surveillance "Mur-M".

About thisinformsState Border Service of Ukraine.

As it is noted, Dron-Kamikadze Ukrainian Defenders made his business quickly and qualitatively.

"Border guards are an integral part of defense forces in the fight against the enemy," the department said.

As reported by the Armyinform, tonight Ukrainian air defense tonightEliminated84 enemy air goals.
title: Defense forces destroyed another Russian Mur-M observation complex
description: The State Border Service of Ukraine informs about it. As noted, Dron-Kamikadze ...
author: Army Inform
